name: Primineral Kongreat
description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. If a monster is sent from your opponent's hand or Deck to the GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position. If this card is flipped face-up: You can target up to 2 cards on the field; destroy them.
